comments: Excellent proposal with strong research backing and clear practical applications. Highly recommend acceptance.
Interesting topic but needs more focus on implementation details. The proposal is somewhat vague about methodology.
Timely topic with good potential. Would suggest more emphasis on case studies as mentioned.
While quantum computing is relevant, this proposal doesn't offer anything novel beyond what's already covered at previous conferences.
Very timely given the expansion of telehealth. The security and integration aspects are particularly valuable.
